title: Vaccination and Immunization - MUIH
description: Do I need vaccinations or immunizations to attend MUIH? Discover more about MUIH obligations, optional learning experiences and requirements.
cleaned_text: immunizations, or records of health history for any of programs of study. Certain optional learning experiences in some of the academic programs may involve participating in activities at off-site locations that may have vaccination or immunization requirements. Students will be made aware of these requirements in advance, and have the option of whether or not to participate in those experiences or instead choose alternate courses or experiences to complete their program requirements.
